content: I work with Prof. Upamanyu Madhow in the WCSL lab at UCSB . My research aims at developing sensing and inference frameworks for low cost millimeter wave systems. I have professional work experience in algorithm design and development projects for wireless technologies such as 5G mmW, 802.11x WLAN, NFC, GPS. My interest lie at streamlining signal processing frameworks for sensing in autonomous applications.

title: Anant Gupta

summary: Rapid spatial association by exploiting Geometry.
title: Spatial data association

summary: Multi-objective optimization to construct large-effective aperture antennas using sparse array of subarrays.
title: Sparse Array Design

summary: Enhanced accuracy and Super-Resolution algorithms for 2D FMCW radar systems.
title: Super-Resolution Algorithms
